QuestData.Title: Threat Reduction
QuestData.Description: In time, Hatuun and his people will set aside their bitterness and become valuable allies. But their trust must be earned.$b$bHe says their village is beset by a demon called Aggonar and his cruel kin.$B$BWe need these fiends out of the way before we can seek out Alleria and the others.$B$BThe chieftain lent us his horn. Use it to call down his people's vengeance upon the demon lieutenants while I carve a path to Aggonar's lair.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Kar'aaz, Xeth'tal, and Magraloth in the Annihilan Pits.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Turalyon at the Seat of Annihilation.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that their lords have been reduced to ash, we may strike at the heart of their power.
